title: Could Alistar jungle work in S5
body: Part of what used to hold Alistar jungle back was the fact that he had relatively slow clears but I've found that by smiting Gromp it really helps your clear times a lot and he has enough sustain not to have to recall every 3 minutes unlike many other junglers so I think that the new jungle may now be somewhat more suited to Alistar than it used to be.

replies.body: Give him max health scaling on his passive and he would be a really healthy jungler. ^.^
it would be like maokai I'd say
i have never tried jungle ali but they did nerf his clears by making his passive not work on monsters, try it in norms and if it works it works
